author: Staff Reporter
text:
A primary school headmaster has been arrested on the charges of misbehaving with girl students in Arani on Saturday.

There are 17 students including 10 girls studying in Municipal Primary School in Govindaraj Street in Arani. Three of the girl students (two from class V and one from Class III) complained with their parents that headmaster of the school Asokan (48) frequently touched them in a way that embarrassed them.

Parents and public thronged the school on Saturday and attacked Mr. Asokan.

Arani All Women Police personnel came and conducted preliminary investigation and arrested Mr. Asokan. He was booked under section 294b and 506(1) of Indian Penal Code (IPC) apart from section 10 and 12 of Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO) Act 2012.
title: Headmaster held for misbehaving with girls
